## Overview

This vignette demonstrates the semScreenR workflow with ethical guardrails, pre/post reporting, and optional careless-responding screening.

## Example

```{r}
library(semScreenR)
library(lavaan)
data("HolzingerSwineford1939", package = "lavaan")
dat <- HolzingerSwineford1939

model <- '
  visual  =~ x1 + x2 + x3
  textual =~ x4 + x5 + x6
  speed   =~ x7 + x8 + x9
'

cfg  <- triage_rules("balanced")
plan <- triage_plan(dat, model, id_cols = "id", config = cfg)
res  <- triage_apply(dat, model, plan)

sem_compare_table(dat, model, res)
```

### Careless responding (optional)

```{r}
items <- paste0("x", 1:9)
sig <- careless_signals(dat, items = items)
head(sig)
```
